pullrequest.title: Inline namespace with project major version

content.raw:
Assuming that I have two executables in my project and I want to link each binary against a different version of Ignition Math, how do I do it? I imagine that the `CMakeLists.txt` looks something like this:


```
#!c++

# Find the Ignition-Math library
find_package(ignition-math4 REQUIRED)
find_package(ignition-math5 REQUIRED)

add_executable(example1 example1.cc)
target_link_libraries(example1 ${IGNITION-MATH_LIBRARIES})

add_executable(example2 example2.cc)
target_link_libraries(example2 ${IGNITION-MATH_LIBRARIES})
```
Should we modify the CMake variables to disambiguate the versions?

**Update**: I see that this is tackled in pull request #178.
